text: Bro I think I like dark themes too much, every app I use is in dark mode lol.
I'm trying to get into ML but sometimes it just feels overwhelming ngl.
Btw remind me, I prefer short explanations over long essays.
Today was exhausting, college labs were so boring.
My fav snacks are literally chips and cold coffee haha.
Wait do you remember that I wanted to learn FastAPI this month?
I get stressed real quick if things don't work in code.
My laptop battery is dying faster these days omg.
I love clean UI designs, kinda obsessed tbh.
Okay so one thing about me—I always study late at night.
I hate noisy environments, can't focus at all.
Should I switch to MongoDB or stick to PostgreSQL?
My birthday is in October btw, random info lol.
Sometimes I overthink small stuff, it's so annoying.
I prefer straightforward advice, no sugarcoating pls.
Been listening to a lot of lo-fi while coding lately.
Do I tell you stuff too fast? I feel like I do.
My fav genres: sci-fi movies and mystery novels.
UGHHH deployments always break for no reason.
Small win today: solved a problem that was stuck for 2 days hehe.
I want to improve my consistency tbh, it’s my biggest weakness.
If I disappear, I'm probably taking a nap lol.
I like when replies are direct and not too formal.
My dream setup is a silent mechanical keyboard.
Right now I’m learning React, it’s fun but confusing sometimes.
I prefer minimalistic designs over fancy stuff.
Lowkey feeling kinda tired today.
My wifi acts up every night at 1am, I swear it's cursed.
Please remember I like keeping my notes super organized.
Also I get motivated when someone gives me small actionable steps.
